name: Little Light of Mine
description:
Little baby's combusting. Normally that's a bad thing, but the light is keeping the monsters away!  Chop down trees and collect wood to keep the baby burning.

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • Move: WASD or arrow keys
    • Chop/Select: Left click or left Ctrl
  • Controller
    • Move: Left joystick
    • Chop/Select: Southward button

Note: The web version doesn't have full support so we recommend downloading the game for the full experience.
